## MemPoolOpts.align property

Number of bytes to align memory blocks to. MUST be a power of 2 and &gt;<!-- -->= 8. Use 16 if the pool is being used for allocating memory used in SIMD operations.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
align: Pow2;
```
